allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix win32timezone import error and enable auto-update by default

- Added win32timezone to PyInstaller hidden imports to fix datetime processing errors
- Changed default auto-update setting to True \(enabled by default\)
- Users will now receive automatic silent updates unless they opt-out
- Fixes "No module named 'win32timezone'" errors when processing Outlook emails

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
